QuestData.Title: Uncovering the Artifact Fragments
QuestData.Description: The Artifact Fragments seem to come from any creature we've found in the outskirts of Ashran. Go out and kill any you find and bring at least fifty to Ecilam the Mage near the campfire in Stormshield Stronghold.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ecilam in Stormshield Stronghold wants you to go kill creatures in the outskirts of Ashran outside of the main road and bring back 50 Artifact Fragments.
